name: Outdoor Research Sun Bucket Hat - Unisex
description: Try this hat to keep your brain from baking on those sun-blasted days.SolarShield™ nylon, polyester ripstop fabric, with UPF 50+ protection.Foam-stiffened brim floats, and is shorter and more stable in gusty conditions.Transaction headband for moisture management and comfort.Externaln drawcord adjustment.Removable chin cord with cord lock.
